title: Two dead in Lunuwewa drowning
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two young men died after drowning in the Lunu Wewa, in Thambuththegama.
Police stated that the two men drowned when they were to bathing in the lake with a group this afternoon (11).
The deceased have been identified as 18 and 23 year old residents of Ahungalla, Galle, and their bodies are currently at the Thambuththegama Hospital.
